name: Mashed Potatoes
ingredients:
Lots of potatoes
Some milk
Some butter
Some seasoning
steps:
Peel potatoes
Wash potatoes
Cut potatoes
Cook potatoes
Eat potatoes
notes:
I prefer Russet, Yukon Golds, or a mix of potatoes.
Remember to taste before adding too much extra butter or seasoning.
Add bacon and use garlic butter instead for a nice twist.
